H0.text: In terms of tonnage of cargo handled, which is the world's largest port. Shanghai

H1.text: In terms of tonnage of cargo handled, which is the world's largest port. Singapore

H2.text: In terms of tonnage of cargo handled, which is the world's largest port. Hong Kong

H3.text: In terms of tonnage of cargo handled, which is the world's largest port. R'dam

A4.text: In 2010, Shanghai port overtook the Port of Singapore to become the world's busiest container port.

A5.text: Singapore's port handled a half million TEU less than Shanghai's in 2010.
